name: Vampira
description: Like a cross between a Bloody Maria and a Salty Dog, this slightly spicy cocktail is lightened with lemon juice and a splash of grapefruit soda. Cholula hot sauce makes it just a little hot, and Clamato adds complexity. Don't worry, you won't taste the clam juice.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon Mexican hot sauce such as Cholula
Mexican Squirt or other grapefruit soda
lemon wheel or wedge to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a 10-ounce glass with ice. Scatter salt on the ice, then pour in the tequila, hot sauce, Clamato, and lemon juice. Top up the glass with grapefruit soda and stir gently. Garnish with lemon and serve immediately.
